allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
TotalAssist rebrand with full monetization system

## Brand & UI
- Rebrand from TechTriage to TotalAssist \(platform\) + Scout \(AI persona\)
- Dark theme throughout \(midnight color palette\)
- New logos: total_assist_logo.png, scout_logo.png
- Improved button/icon contrast and accessibility

## Pricing & Tiers
- Scout Free: 5 chat/month, 1 photo/month, voice/video locked
- Scout Home \($9.99/mo\): Unlimited chat/photo/voice, 1 video credit/week
- Scout Pro \($19.99/mo\): Everything unlimited, 15 video credits/month, premium AI

## Monetization System \(usageStore\)
- Tier-based usage tracking with monthly/weekly resets
- Video credits system with weekly reset \(Home\) / monthly reset \(Pro\)
- Ad-hoc credit purchases \($5/1 credit, $12/3 pack\)
- Signup gate for guests, upgrade gate for free users
- RefillCreditsModal for paid users who exhaust credits

## New Components
- UpgradeModal, SignupGateModal, RefillCreditsModal
- ForgotPassword, ResetPassword flows
- DiagnosticReport for video analysis output
- UsageMeter in Dashboard sidebar

## Features
- Scout Chat, Scout Snapshot, Scout Signal \(voice\), Video Diagnostic
- 4 features displayed on Pricing and HowItWorks pages
- FAQ section for each feature including Scout Signal
- Markdown rendering in chat widget

## Infrastructure
- Added INFRASTRUCTURE_SETUP.md with full deployment guide
- Supabase, Google OAuth, Resend, Stripe setup instructions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(HOME_USER_ID="7a4d78d0-7e00-4945-8944-57f316523841" __NEW_LINE_c6b69e139169bc8e__ echo "=== Step 3: Test saving a chat session ===" curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5000/api/sessions -H "Content-Type: application/json" -b /tmp/home_cookies.txt -d "{
    ""userId"": ""$HOME_USER_ID"",
    ""sessionType"": ""chat"",
    ""title"": ""UAT Test - Router Issue"",
    ""summary"": ""User had trouble with router lights blinking"",
    ""transcript"": [{""role"": ""user"", ""text"": ""My router has a blinking red light"", ""timestamp"": 1234567890}]
  }" __NEW_LINE_c6b69e139169bc8e__ echo "" echo "" __NEW_LINE_c6b69e139169bc8e__ echo "=== Step 4: Check session was saved ===" curl -s "http://localhost:5000/api/sessions/$HOME_USER_ID" __NEW_LINE_c6b69e139169bc8e__ echo "" echo "" __NEW_LINE_c6b69e139169bc8e__ echo "=== Step 5: Check usage was incremented ===" curl -s "http://localhost:5000/api/subscription/status/$HOME_USER_ID")
